page.title: 08BADGWORTH CHURCH
page.content: DOMINATING THE VILLAGE OF BADGWORTH AND SITUATED ON A SMALL KNOLL OF THE MENDIP FOOTHILLS,IS THE SMALL GREY CHURCH DEDICATED TO SAINT CONG R. THE CHURCH IS CONSTRUCTED OF LOCAL GREY CARBONIFEROUS LIMESTONE.SINCE THE VILLAGE WHICH IT SERVES CONSISTS OF ONLY ABOUT TWENTY HOUSES,IT IS A LARGE CHURCH WITH SEATING FOR APPROXIMATELY 150 PEOPLE. THE CHURCH HAS A CENTRAL NAVE WITH A SOUTH PORCH WITH A NEW SUNDIAL,A NORTH AISLE AND A WEST TOWER. INSIDE ARE A NUMBER OF MEMORIALS,SOME OF THE OLDER ONES FORMING PART OF THE FLOOR.IT HAS A COOL AND CALM ATMOSPHERE. IT IS SURROUNDED BY A WALLED CHURCHYARD.
